description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，中国共产党党员。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China and a member of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国吉林省延边朝鲜族自治州下辖的县级市。
description.en: A county-level city under the jurisdiction of Yanbian Korean Autonomous Prefecture, Jilin Province, People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党吉林大学委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党吉林大学委员会
吉林宝源丰禽业有限公司特别重大火灾爆炸事故

description.zh-cn: 2013年6月3日发生于吉林宝源丰禽业有限公司的特别重大火灾爆炸事故，造成121人死亡、76人受伤。
description.en: A major fire and explosion accident that occurred on June 3, 2013, at Jilin Baoyuanfeng Poultry Co., Ltd., resulting in 121 deaths and 76 injuries.

description.zh-cn: 2018年7月，长春长生生物科技有限责任公司被曝出狂犬病疫苗生产记录造假，以及百白破疫苗为“劣药”。
description.en: In July 2018, Changchun Changsheng Bio-technology was revealed to have fabricated production records for its rabies vaccine and that its DPT vaccine was substandard.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任吉林大学党委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Party Secretary of Jilin University.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，接替姜治莹担任吉林大学党委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician who succeeded Jiang Zhiying as Party Secretary of Jilin University.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共延边朝鲜族自治州委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Party Secretary of Yanbian Korean Autonomous Prefecture.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，接替姜治莹担任中共延边朝鲜族自治州委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician who succeeded Jiang Zhiying as Party Secretary of Yanbian Korean Autonomous Prefecture.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共吉林省委政法委员会书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Secretary of the Political and Legal Affairs Commission of the Jilin Provincial Party Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，接替姜治莹担任中共吉林省委政法委员会书记。
description.en: Chinese politician who succeeded Jiang Zhiying as Secretary of the Political and Legal Affairs Commission of the Jilin Provincial Party Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共吉林省委统战部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former head of the United Front Work Department of the Jilin Provincial Party Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，接替姜治莹担任中共吉林省委统战部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician who succeeded Jiang Zhiying as head of the United Front Work Department of the Jilin Provincial Party Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共白城市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Party Secretary of Baicheng.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，接替姜治莹担任中共白城市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician who succeeded Jiang Zhiying as Party Secretary of Baicheng.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任长春市人民政府市长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Mayor of Changchun.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，接替姜治莹担任长春市人民政府市长。
description.en: Chinese politician who succeeded Jiang Zhiying as Mayor of Changchun.

degree.zh-cn: 哲学社会学院马克思主义专业毕业
degree.en: Graduated from the School of Philosophy and Sociology with a major in Marxism

relationships.target: 第十二届全国人民代表大会
中共吉林省委政法委员会
中共延边朝鲜族自治州委员会
中国共产党吉林大学委员会

description.zh-cn: 因对吉林宝源丰禽业有限公司特别重大火灾爆炸事故负有间接领导责任，时任长春市市长的姜治莹被记大过处分。
description.en: Jiang Zhiying, then mayor of Changchun, was given a major demerit for indirect leadership responsibility in the Jilin Baoyuanfeng Poultry Co., Ltd. fire and explosion accident.

description.zh-cn: 因长春长生疫苗丑闻，曾担任长春市市长的姜治莹被要求作出深刻检查。
description.en: Due to the Changchun Changsheng vaccine scandal, Jiang Zhiying, who had served as the mayor of Changchun, was required to make a profound self-criticism.

description.zh-cn: 姜治莹接替杨振斌担任中国共产党吉林大学委员会书记。
description.en: Jiang Zhiying succeeded Yang Zhenbin as the Secretary of the Jilin University Committee of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 田辉接替姜治莹担任中国共产党吉林大学委员会书记。
description.en: Tian Hui succeeded Jiang Zhiying as the Secretary of the Jilin University Committee of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 姜治莹接替庄严担任中国共产党延边朝鲜族自治州委员会书记。
description.en: Jiang Zhiying succeeded Zhuang Yan as the Secretary of the Yanbian Korean Autonomous Prefecture Committee of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 田锦尘接替姜治莹担任中国共产党延边朝鲜族自治州委员会书记。
description.en: Tian Jinchen succeeded Jiang Zhiying as the Secretary of the Yanbian Korean Autonomous Prefecture Committee of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 姜治莹接替金振吉担任中国共产党吉林省委员会政法委员会书记。
description.en: Jiang Zhiying succeeded Jin Zhenji as the Secretary of the Political and Legal Affairs Commission of the Jilin Provincial Committee of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 胡家福接替姜治莹担任中国共产党吉林省委员会政法委员会书记。
description.en: Hu Jiafu succeeded Jiang Zhiying as the Secretary of the Political and Legal Affairs Commission of the Jilin Provincial Committee of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 姜治莹接替刚占标担任中国共产党吉林省委员会统一战线工作部部长。
description.en: Jiang Zhiying succeeded Gang Zhanbiao as the head of the United Front Work Department of the Jilin Provincial Committee of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 李景浩接替姜治莹担任中国共产党吉林省委员会统一战线工作部部长。
description.en: Li Jinghao succeeded Jiang Zhiying as the head of the United Front Work Department of the Jilin Provincial Committee of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 姜治莹接替岳清友担任中国共产党白城市委员会书记。
description.en: Jiang Zhiying succeeded Yue Qingyou as the Secretary of the Baicheng Municipal Committee of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 李晋修接替姜治莹担任中国共产党白城市委员会书记。
description.en: Li Jinxiu succeeded Jiang Zhiying as the Secretary of the Baicheng Municipal Committee of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 姜治莹接替崔杰担任长春市人民政府市长。
description.en: Jiang Zhiying succeeded Cui Jie as the Mayor of Changchun Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 刘长龙接替姜治莹担任长春市人民政府市长。
description.en: Liu Changlong succeeded Jiang Zhiying as the Mayor of Changchun Municipal People's Government.
